summary: Provides a command‑line utility that configures and runs inference with a LoRA‑adapted Stable Diffusion model using NVIDIA NeMo. It prepares the model configuration, sets up a distributed trainer, loads the fine‑tuned checkpoint, processes text prompts, generates images, and saves the results.
business_intent: Allow end‑users and developers to quickly generate high‑quality images from textual descriptions by leveraging a pre‑trained diffusion model enhanced with low‑rank adaptation, without requiring full model retraining.
